short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raising your virtual pet on Twitter, hunting chest and farming $ token.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Twitter, nurture XLAB pets, assist them in exploring and hunting treasure chests, and in return, you'll receive abundant $XLAB and $BLAB rewards.

In XLAB, we combine blockchain technology with gaming mechanics. Users nurture pets, level up, form teams, embark on adventures, explore, and ultimately conquer the game world. During exploration, users interact with others on Twitter and can earn rewards by participating in various tasks.
